Frédéric Chopin

Twelve Études, op. 10

1829–1832 · Chomiński 14–25 · Brown 42, 57, 59, 67–68, 74–75

[Wikipedia] · [IMSLP]

Total duration: 27' 30"

  • 1. C major
  • 2. A minor
  • 3. E major
  • 4. C-sharp minor
  • 5. G-flat major
  • 6. E-flat minor
  • 7. C major
  • 8. F major
  • 9. F minor
  • 10. A-flat major
  • 11. E-flat major
  • 12. C minor

The études are spread over multiple entries in the Brown catalogue.
